name: Ollie
description: a ollie is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and land back on the board

name: Pop Shuvit
description: a pop shuvit is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and flick your foot off the back of the board
a ollie 180 is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and land back on the board while turning your body 180 degrees forward

name: 360 Pop Shuvit
description: a 360 pop shuvit is the same as a pop shuvit but with a extra spin

name: Heelflip
description: a heelflip is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and flick your foot off the front of the board

name: Kickflip
description: a kickflip is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and flick your foot off the side of the board

name: Varial Kickflip
description: a varial kickflip is the combination of a pop shuvit and a kickflip

name: Varial Heelflip
description: a varial heelflip is the combination of a front pop shuvit and a heelflip

name: Big Spin
description: a big spin is the combination of 360 pop shuvit and a body varial in the same direction

name: 360 Flip/Tre Flip
description: a 360 flip is the combination of a backside 360 pop shuvit and a kickflip

name: Laser Flip
description: a laser flip is the combination of a frontside 360 pop shuvit and a heelflip

name: Hardflip
description: a hardflip is the combination of a frontside pop shuvit and a kickflip

name: Inward Heelflip
description: a inward heelflip is the combination of a backside pop shuvit and a heelflip
